h1: How much did your equipment cost in total, in pounds?
pageTitle: How much did your equipment cost in total, in pounds?
hint: Include any delivery, training or installation costs your grant covers.

validation.invalid: Enter the equipment cost in pounds

reviewBlock.p: The amount we will pay back is slightly less than the total cost of the equipment or adaptations because we've deducted the amount your employer agreed to pay.
reviewBlock.totalAfterContribution: Total amount we can pay towards this claim
